comment:
That’s great, I’ll be glad to try and help these beta mobile versions.
Will also an iPad / tablet app be available ?
I’m not sure to understand why you want to build a custom made sync relay server while some web standards, such as WebDAV, already exist ? If you make an open source server, please don’t make it only docker... I would like to be able to create a Yunohost version
name: Arnaud
